docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 22--With his five-year plan four years old and his renomination for President virtually certain next year, Gen. Juan Peron has still not rid his regime of certain political abuses involving civil rights. These have continued to...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 22--With his five-year plan four years old and his renomination for President virtually certain next year, Gen. Juan Peron has still not rid his regime of certain political abuses involving civil rights. These have continued to hurt his country abroad.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 25--Col. Mark A. Devine Jr., executive officer of the army intelligence division and commanding officer of a cavalry group in the Battle of the Bulge in Belgium, died today of a heart ailment at his home. He was 52 years old.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 25--Col. Mark A. Devine Jr., executive officer of the army intelligence division and commanding officer of a cavalry group in the Battle of the Bulge in Belgium, died today of a heart ailment at his home. He was 52 years old.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, Oct. 26--The United States and Britain today rejected the Soviet Union's latest proposal for a one-third cut in the armed forces of the Big Five and made it plain that the West would continue building strength until Moscow proved that...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, Oct. 26--The United States and Britain today rejected the Soviet Union's latest proposal for a one-third cut in the armed forces of the Big Five and made it plain that the West would continue building strength until Moscow proved that its goal was genuine peace.
